snippet.title: Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask - Official Trailer | Six One Indie Showcase
snippet.description:
Learn about Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask in this trailer for the upcoming 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up game with cooperative elements for up to 4 players. The game is about Mexican Lucha Libre, with real Mexican stars luchadores, and the history of Mexico. Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation in Spring 2025, and a demo is avaiable now.

It will feature a selection of renowned Mexican wrestlers who are represented by Masked Republic's Legends of Lucha Libre division. Among those they represent are Konnan, Rush, Keyra, Christi Jaynes, Mr Iguana and LA Park.
